CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Day_started_time__c)), TEXT( IF( MOD( VALUE(MID(TEXT(Day_started_time__c + (5.5/24)), 12, 2)), 12 ) = 0, 12, MOD( VALUE(MID(TEXT(Day_started_time__c + (5.5/24)), 12, 2)), 12 ) ) ) & ":" & MID(TEXT(Day_started_time__c + (5.5/24)), 15, 2) & " " & IF( VALUE(MID(TEXT(Day_started_time__c + (5.5/24)), 12, 2)) >= 12, "PM", "AM" ), NULL )
CustomField.label: Log Start Time
